Text.content:
The Job Offer is a specialized content for creating job offer entries. It can contain several paragraphs and images, as well as information about location, start and end date etc. The Job Offer is similar to the Blog Article. Compared to the much simpler Content Section the Job Offer is a semantic entity.

The full content of an Job Offer is usually displayed on a Detail page that is accessed through a List like the one below.
